verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* the \w building|strong="H1129"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and all \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w desire|strong="H2837"\w* which he was \w pleased|strong="H2654"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*,

That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, as he had \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto him at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and thy \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, that thou hast \w made|strong="H2603"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me: I have \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which thou hast \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; and mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* and mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall be there \w perpetually|strong="H3117"\w*.

And if thou wilt \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, in \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and in \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \add and\add* wilt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*:

Then I will \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of thy \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, as I \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* thee a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\add But\add* if ye shall at \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* me, ye or your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and will not \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \add and\add* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* which I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, but \w go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them:

Then will I cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them; and this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which I have \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, will I cast \w out|strong="H7971"\w* of my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* and a \w byword|strong="H8148"\w* among all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

And at this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add which\add* is \w high|strong="H5945"\w*, every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* by it shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, and shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w*; and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* thus unto this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and to this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

And they shall \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and have taken \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* upon \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and have \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* them, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* them: therefore hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* upon them all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, when \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

(\add Now\add* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* had \w furnished|strong="H5375"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* with \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* and \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, according to all his \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*,) that \w then|strong="H0227"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="H1551"\w*.

And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him; and they \w pleased|strong="H3474"\w* him not.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft pleased…: Heb. were not right in his eyes\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are\add* these which thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me, my \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*? And he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Cabul|strong="H3521"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft Cabul: that is, displeasing, or, dirty\f*
And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sixscore|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

¶ And this \add is\add* the \w reason|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w levy|strong="H4522"\w* which \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w raised|strong="H5927"\w*; for to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*, and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, and \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, and \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*.

\add For\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* had gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it \add for\add* a \w present|strong="H7964"\w* unto his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.
And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*, and \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w nether|strong="H8481"\w*,
And \w Baalath|strong="H1191"\w*, and \w Tadmor|strong="H8412"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*,

And all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w store|strong="H4543"\w* that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had, and \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and \w that|strong="H2837"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w desired|strong="H2836"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft that which…: Heb. the desire of Solomon which he desired\f*

\add And\add* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, which \add were\add* not of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

Their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* that were \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whom the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* also were not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* utterly to \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w*, upon those did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w levy|strong="H5927"\w* a \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w* of \w bondservice|strong="H5647"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

But of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* no \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*: but they \add were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and his \w captains|strong="H7991"\w*, and \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

These \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w officers|strong="H5324"\w* that \add were\add* over \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, which bare \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

¶ But \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which \add Solomon\add* had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for her: then did he \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*.

¶ And \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* in a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* which he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and he burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. So he \w finished|strong="H7999"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.  +  r 9.25  t upon the altar that: Heb. upon it, etc *

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a navy of \w ships|strong="H0590"\w* in \w Ezion-geber|strong="H6100"\w*, which \add is\add* beside \w Eloth|strong="H0359"\w*, on the \w shore|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft shore: Heb. lip\f*

And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* in the \w navy|strong="H0590"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w shipmen|strong="H0582"\w* that had \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, with the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* from thence \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.
